plot: John Oliver examines RFK Jr.'s impact on US public health agencies during Trump's era, discussing department layoffs and their consequences for the public.

John Oliver discusses how public health agencies in the U.S. under RFK Jr.'s gone wild as Trump described. As massive layoff is happening in different crucial departments he discussed what RFK is doing, in many ways it will impact the general people and the troubling direction these all are going.—Niaz Islam Arif
